data.message: This weekend, more than 700 Facebook employees, including Mark Zuckerberg, as well as former Super Bowl champion Brendon Ayanbadejo, marched in the San Francisco Pride Parade to show their support for the LGBTQ community. To stay up to date on the latest information around LGBTQ and diversity at Facebook, follow Facebook Diversity. #PrideConnectsUs
data.story: Facebook added 12 new photos — in San Francisco, California.
